meanings.sent1: The hyperefficient machine completed the task in record time.
meanings.sent2: The hyperefficient team finished the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The hyperefficient robot never took a coffee break.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperefficient mind processed information like a supercomputer.
meanings.sent5: The hyperefficient car used fuel sparingly, like a marathon runner conserving energy.

meanings.definition: Operating at a level of efficiency that is significantly higher than average.
meanings.sent1: The hyperefficient factory increased production by 50%.
meanings.sent2: The hyperefficient system saved time and resources.
meanings.sent3: The hyperefficient toaster popped up toast before you even put the bread in.
meanings.sent4: His hyperefficient workflow was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The hyperefficient student aced every test without breaking a sweat.
